text: Uye kana munhu wega-wega akatadza (nekusatenda muna Allah uye kunamata vamwe vanamwari) aine zvose zvepanyika uye ozoda kuzvishandisa kutenga chidzikinuro chake (hachisi kuzogamuchirwa), uye vachave mumoyo yavo nekugununâ€™una pavachaona mutongo, uye vachatongwa zvine ruenzaniso, uye hapana chakaipa chichaitwa kwavari
